long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions manages your PGP keys. You can add or generate a Public/Private key pair or you can generate one. Then you will be able to encrypt and decrypt messages.  It also has a way to add and and use other public keys so you can encrypt messages for other people to decrypt. You can also backup your data to Google Drive.
